column1: Anjozorobe is a large town in the Analamanga Region
column3: approximately 90 kilometers north-east of the capital Antananarivo. Anjozorobe Forest Corridor is one of the last high plateau forest in Madagascar. Another high plateau forest is located in the protected area of Ambohitantely.

column1: In the pilgrim city of Anosivolakely Virgin Maria supposedly appeared in 1990.
Conservation of the Anjozorobe Forest Corridor
